presentationColumns.name: Ordered Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of Requested Quantity in Secondary UOM.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - INV Transfer Orders.Secondary Ordered Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Transfer Order Return Delivered Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of Delivered Quantity in Secondary UOM where Transaction Origin type is 'Return'.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - INV Transfer Orders.Secondary Return Transfer Order Delivered Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Cancelled Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of Cancelled Quantity in Secondary UOM.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - INV Transfer Orders.Secondary Cancelled Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Shipped Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of Shipped Quantity in Secondary UOM.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - INV Transfer Orders.Secondary Shipped Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Received Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of Received Quantity in Secondary UOM.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - INV Transfer Orders.Secondary Received Quantity

presentationColumns.name: Delivered Quantity
presentationColumns.description: This metric is calculated as sum of Delivered Quantity in Secondary UOM.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - INV Transfer Orders.Secondary Delivered Quantity
